promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi young rare wolf grass-type pokemon wearing green runic armor. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or wolf. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdefang, a a chibi young rare wolf grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Jungle Edge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "wolf", "grass" or "Verdefang". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, wolf-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: In jungle habitats lurks the chibi rarity, Verdefang. With its Jungle Edge, it weaves between foliage, a playful pup of verdant mystery.
